origin.chickensorigins.pixie.name: Pixie
origin.chickensorigins.pixie.description: A tiny, fey prankster only known in legends.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/feather_foot: Their small size means they fall slower and cannot take fall damage.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/flight.name: Flight
power.chickensorigins.pixie/flight.descr: Pixies can fly however their wings prevent the use of Elytras.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/mischief_lau: Cause a loud bang and escape quickly before they see you!
power.chickensorigins.pixie/pixie_proper: Pixies are tiny and somewhat fragile, reaching less than half a block tall!
power.chickensorigins.pixie/soaked.name: Soaked
power.chickensorigins.pixie/soaked.descr: Water poses a significant threat to pixies. It hampers their movement and prevents their ability to fly.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/troublemaker: Villagers know pixies by the legends of trouble they cause, and will refuse to trade with them.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/pixie_dust.d: Legends speak of the shrinking power of pixie dust... although pixies just use it to change their wings. 'Blue is so last summer!'
power.chickensorigins.pixie/invisibility: Once per day, they can go invisible for a 30 seconds. Were they ever there?
